005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.MetaschemaDataTypeProvider;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidValueForCastFunctionException;
010
011import java.time.Duration;
012
013import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
014
015public interface IDayTimeDurationItem extends IDurationItem {
016  /**
017   * Construct a new day time duration item using the provided string
018   * {@code value}.
019   *
020   * @param value
021   *          a string representing a day time duration
022   * @return the new item
023   */
024  @NonNull
025  static IDayTimeDurationItem valueOf(@NonNull String value) {
026    try {
027      return valueOf(MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.DAY_TIME_DURATION.parse(value));
028    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
029      throw new InvalidValueForCastFunctionException(String.format("Unable to parse string value '%s'", value),
030          ex);
031    }
032  }
033
034  /**
035   * Construct a new day time duration item using the provided {@code value}.
036   *
037   * @param value
038   *          a duration
039   * @return the new item
040   */
041  @NonNull
042  static IDayTimeDurationItem valueOf(@NonNull Duration value) {
043    return new DayTimeDurationItemImpl(value);
044  }
045
046  /**
047   * Cast the provided type to this item type.
048   *
049   * @param item
050   *          the item to cast
051   * @return the original item if it is already this type, otherwise a new item
052   *         cast to this type
053   * @throws InvalidValueForCastFunctionException
054   *           if the provided {@code item} cannot be cast to this type
055   */
056  @NonNull
057  static IDayTimeDurationItem cast(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
058    return MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.DAY_TIME_DURATION.cast(item);
059  }
060
061  /**
062   * Get the items wrapped value as a duration.
063   *
064   * @return the wrapped value as a duration
065   */
066  @NonNull
067  Duration asDuration();
068
069  /**
070   * Get the "wrapped" duration value in seconds.
071   *
072   * @return the underlying duration in seconds
073   */
074  default long asSeconds() {
075    return asDuration().toSeconds();
076  }
077
078  @Override
079  default IDayTimeDurationItem castAsType(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
080    return cast(item);
081  }
082
083  /**
084   * Compares this value with the argument.
085   *
086   * @param item
087   *          the item to compare with this value
088   * @return a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer if this value is less
089   *         than, equal to, or greater than the {@code item}.
090   */
091  default int compareTo(@NonNull IDayTimeDurationItem item) {
092    return asDuration().compareTo(item.asDuration());
093
094  }
095
096  @Override
097  default int compareTo(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
098    return compareTo(cast(item));
099  }
100}
